name: CIFeature
desc: The abstract superclass for objects representing notable features detected in an image.

items.name: var bounds: CGRect
items.desc: The rectangle that holds discovered feature.

items.name: var type: String
items.desc: The type of feature that was discovered.

items.name: let CIFeatureTypeFace: String
items.desc: The discovered feature is a personâ€™s face.

items.name: let CIFeatureTypeRectangle: String
items.desc: The discovered feature is a rectangular object, though it might appear in perspective in the image.

items.name: let CIFeatureTypeQRCode: String
items.desc: The discovered feature is a Quick Response code (2D barcode).

items.name: let CIFeatureTypeText: String
items.desc: The discovered feature is a region likely to contain upright text.
